About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

My name is Bechor, I am 27 years old.

I have always loved technology, from a young age. After significant service I decided to enter the field professionally and studied software practical engineering with a cyber specialization in Ariel University, I graduated with honors. I have done multiple projects since my final project- a management and analysis system of information for police officers. The site is responsive and enables full digital activity from personnel management to distribution of reports. Client side angular, server side roaming mvc architecture mysql database. I am currently continuing to learn and develop and looking for my next challenge
